title: Administrative Financial Analyst-Global Migation & Quarantine Center for Disease Control at Bristol Bay Native (Atlanta, GA)
text: Source: Bristol Bay Native Eagle Medical Services is a provider of direct healthcare and support services to government agencies, including Military Treatment Facilities (MTF) both state side and overseas. Eagle Medical Services (EMS)is nationally recognized for excellence in supporting, managing and staffing, the mission of our customers through Medical, Applied Sciences and Research and Development. EMS is currently searching for Administrative Financial Analysts for the Division of Global Migration and Quarantine, Center for Disease Control CDC Atlanta, GA. Duties will include, but not limited to: 1. Assist with staffing coordination for field deployments, Task Force EOC operations, planning and execution of entry screening at Ports of Entry across the U.S. 2. Coordinate budget activities for the Task Force including developing budget estimates, tracking costs, and responding to requests for information 3. Assist with procurements for the Task Force and deployments 4. Coordinate the processing of domestic travel requests to support the Task Force 5. Develop and implement operational plans, procedures, and tracking mechanisms to increase effectiveness and efficiency of the operational aspects of the Task Force response 6. Coordinate all aspects of deployment rounds/cohorts for GMTF and track activities including keeping spreadsheets and Gantt Calendars up to date 7. Facilitate and manage all pre and post deployment communications and details with people identified/rostered for deployments, including setting expectations, clinic visits, navigation through the EOC system, country call updates, and visa/passport issues 8. Coordinate closely with the International Assistance Team (IAT) to support the needs and requests of deployed staff, both before, during, and after deployment, including supplies and equipment needs Four year degree in related field. Experience Must have at least 3 years of related experience. Special Requirements/Certifications N/A Physical Requirements N/A
